doc.name: extension
doc.synopsis: Custom PHP code that will receive the forms data
doc.description: Use this option to have WSForm pass all the submitted form parameters to your own PHP code for handling.
doc.parameters:
extension="mycustomextension"


In the WSForm/modules/handlers/posts folder a new folder must be created. In this case : mycustomextension

There a file name post-handler.php must be created. That file will be loaded and can have its own handling code.

$wsPostFields is a variable that will be available for the extension that will hold all the form data posted

When a page has been created, $title will hold the name of the page.
doc.note: If the extension cannot be found, it will be ignored
